page.syntax: Layout_Properties as P = a5_layout_design(C object_name ,C type )

argument.name: object_name
argument.description: The name of the layout to edit. Character

argument.name: type
argument.description: The type of the layout. Valid values are:"Form", "Browse", "Report", "Label", "Letter"

page.description: Opens the specified layout in Design mode.
page.discussion: The A5_LAYOUT_DESIGN() function opens the named layout in the appropriate editor.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following command opens the Invoice report in the Report Editor.
section.example: ? a5_layout_design("invoice", "report") 'opens the report editor = drop_down_menu = "" filter = "" filter_mode = "all" height = 355.000000 left = 160.000000 order = "" +settings. toolbar = "" top = 294.000000 width = 799.000000 window_title = "Fred.set : Report Editor (invoice)"
